comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Lelia Sinclair Montague Gordon Barnett (1871-1959)--she was a Washington socialite, a widow who married Marine colonel George Barnett (1859-1930), later Commandant of the US Marine Corps. Her daughters here would be Leila and Anne Gordon. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Barnett www.arlingtoncemetery.net/gbarnett.htm The younger Lelia (b 1899) married at least three times, to Robert Russell Dickey Jr. (divorced), in 1934 to Newbold Noyes of the publishing family (he died in 1942), and as her third husband the Rev. Albert Hawley Lucas, who died in 1973. She ran the Lelia Noyes Dress Shop on Connecticut Avenue in Washington DC for many years; she died in 1989. These women were all cousins to Wallis Simpson--they're mentioned in her memoirs.
